title: Workshop on Applying Theoretical Frameworks for Literary Education Textbook Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of literary theory and pedagogy, experience in instructional material analysis
context.additional_context: Providing mobile-optimized microlearning content for working adult learners, combining real-time interaction and self-directed learning

learning_goals: Learners can analyze educational design approaches of various literary materials according to Langer's "5 Stages of Imagination Building" and Witte & Samihaian's literary education paradigm model
Learners can evaluate educational effectiveness by comparing text selection criteria, task types, and reader interaction methods across materials
Learners can explain the strengths and weaknesses of learner-centered vs. text-centered approaches in digital literary education design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
